RelatedSentence: A state of emergency that was in place in Austria in response to dramatic flooding that left some areas cut off was lifted yesterday as the rain subsided .
Areas in the state of Lower Austria were hit with heavy floods following torrential rain last week , leaving many villages cut off and houses and roads overrun with flood water .

A1: , areas could still be at risk of mudslides
RelatedSentence: Experts are warning however that although the river level has dropped and the clean - up has almost finished , areas could still be at risk of mudslides because of the softened earth .
On Saturday Hollenstein an der Ybbs had already experienced several mudslides .
Around 1,000 firemen worked last week and over the weekend to secure 1000 houses along the river with twenty thousand sandbags deployed to hold back the water .

Austria is among several countries in central and south - eastern Europe that had declared a state of emergency following flooding in the region .

RelatedSentence: In other areas of Europe , the flooding has been even more extreme , killing at least 19 people in Serbia and in Bosnia army helicopters were sent in to rescue dozens of people stranded in a town .
